casebody.data:
Leo G. HALE, Claimant-Appellant, v. Anthony J. PRINCIPI, Secretary of Veterans Affairs, Respondent-Appellee. No. 01-7083. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 10, 2002.

Before NEWMAN, RADER, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36
